turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello assistant, I need to order a couple pizzas from Happy Joes Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, which Happy Joes will you need me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Happy Joes Pizza in Dubuque, IA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will do that for you, what can I order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The first pizza I want will be a large pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like on this pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it to be a speciality pizza, the BLT pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can order that for you, would you like me to add Taco Sauce to this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks, not for this pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like for your second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a large specialty pizza again for this one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that for you, which specialty?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like this want to be a Taco Pizza with extra chips.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like Taco Sauce added to this order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like extra taco sauce packets for this pizza please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes I can do that for you. Would you like anything else ordered from Happy Joes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an order of the Buffalo Wings, extra crispy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I added buffalo wings to your order. Does that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to add a 2 liter to this order as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which 2 liter pop would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like this to be a coca cola 2 liter.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will add a 2 liter coca cola to the order. Does this complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You know what, add some cheese stix to this order as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that. I added cheese stix to your order, does that complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you repeat my order to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, You want 2 large specialty pizzas. One is a BLT pizza and the other is a Taco PIzza with extra chips and extra taco sauce packets. You want an order of buffalo wings and cheese stix. You also want a 2 liter coca cola, is this correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will place that order for you. Your receipt will be emailed to your email address. Expect your pizzas from Happy Joes Pizza in Dubuque, IA to be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure, enjoy your night.
